page.title: 18Local Newspapers
page.content: There are several local newspapers in the area most of them being published weekly. "The Chronicle"is published on Thursday's and deals mainly with Bangor news.Its offices are in High Street but it is printed at Oswestry. It is an English medium paper. "The North Wales Weekly News" is published and printed at Llandudno Junction and contains a limited amount of Bangor news.It also is an English paper. "The Gwynedd Leader" and "The Bangor and Anglesey Mail" are both free papers the former having offices at Bangor but is printed at Sheffield. The "Daily Post" based at Liverpool gives a limited daily news cover whilst "Y Goriad" is the only Welsh paper and is published 10 times a year.
